attributes.action: Stop all U.K military personnel going to Ukraine.
attributes.additional_details: political decisions made by leaders who remain safe from the horrors of war. It is unjust to sacrifice the lives of our citizens in conflicts that do not directly threaten our homeland, while those in power face no personal risk. The government should prioritize diplomacy and peaceful
attributes.background: I strongly oppose the UK government sending young men and women to Ukraine to fight and die based on  solutions rather than dragging our youth into a war that serves political interests rather than national security.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Don't send troops to Ukraine to support peacekeeping
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705814
